meanings.definition: Fumarases: enzymes that catalyze the reversible hydration/dehydration of fumaric acid
meanings.sent1: The fumarases in our body help with the hydration and dehydration of fumaric acid.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study fumarases to understand how they affect chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The fumarases in the lab were so busy, they forgot to hydrate themselves!
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like fumarases, switching between hydration and dehydration effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The fumarases worked like tiny chemical wizards, transforming fumaric acid with precision.

meanings.definition: Fumarases: plural form of fumarase, a type of enzyme
meanings.sent1: Many fumarases are needed to complete the chemical process efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician carefully handled the fumarases during the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The fumarases gathered for a group photo before starting their work.
meanings.sent4: In the world of enzymes, fumarases stand out like a team of superheroes.
meanings.sent5: The fumarases hummed with activity, each playing a crucial role in the reaction.

meanings.definition: Fumarases: belonging to or relating to the class of enzymes known as fumarase
meanings.sent1: The fumarases group meeting discussed the latest enzyme research.
meanings.sent2: Her thesis focused on the unique properties of fumarases enzymes.
meanings.sent3: The fumarases party was a hit among biochemistry students.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked in a fumarases way, always analyzing and adapting.
meanings.sent5: The fumarases characteristics made them essential in the biochemical process.
